text:
For a Tomcat/Apache setup, a previously working symbolic link setup in the
server.xml generates 404's once the context is reloaded via the manager 
application. Restarting Tomcat does, however, bring back access to the symlink 
directory. This issue does not occur in Tomcat standalone mode.
